family.parents: Lives in a small village, writes to them weekly
family.siblings: Two older brothers who work on the family farm
family.extended_family: Close to her grandmother who taught her many stories

friends.mary: Best friend among the servants, they share a room
friends.tom: The stable boy who teaches her about horses
friends.elizabeth: An older servant who acts like a big sister

work_relationships.head_housekeeper: Respects but is slightly intimidated by
work_relationships.other_servants: Generally gets along well with, especially the younger ones
work_relationships.employers: Polite and professional, but keeps a respectful distance

interaction_patterns: Helpful and patient with new servants
Curious about city life and new experiences
